### Government Tender Announcement

#### CCGS G. Peddle Drydocking Refit

**Reference Number:** PW_HAL_201_11601
**Solicitation Number:** F5561-220655/A
**Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, 13:00 (ET)

The Government of Canada is soliciting bids from qualified suppliers to provide dry-docking refit services for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) G. Peddle. The refit work will be carried out on a non-operational vessel and will take place at a dry dock facility in Eastern Canada.

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, hull repairs, renewal of main engine components, upgrading of main engine systems, replacement of life-saving appliances, and renewal of main electrical distribution system.

The contract will be awarded based on lowest dollar amount.

**Key Dates:**

* Bidders' Conference: November 22, 2022, via teleconference
* Site Visit: November 22, 2022, at Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
* Closing Date: December 13, 2022, 13:00 (ET)

**Important Requirements:**

* The Contractor will be responsible for the safe and efficient conduct of work, including the repair and replacement of components, as well as the management of all deliveries and services.
* The Contractor must comply with all relevant safety regulations and provide a safe working environment for its personnel.
* The Contractor must ensure that all work is completed in accordance with the requirements outlined in the issued drawings and specifications.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The requirement is exempt from the provisions of the Comprehensive Economic Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Canada Post Connect application or by fax. Hardcopy submissions will not be accepted.

For more information, including the terms and conditions of the contract, please see the tender documents available on the [Canada Buying Service](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.
